- [93mMulti[0m-[93mhit[0m [93mTP53[0m [93mconfers[0m the [93mpoorest[0m [93msurvival[0m in [93mmultiple[0m [93mmyeloma[0m in the [93mera[0m of [93mnovel[0m [93mtherapies[0m.: [93mMultiple[0m [93mmyeloma[0m ([93mMM[0m) with [93mhigh[0m-[93mrisk[0m ([93mHR[0m) [93mgenetic[0m [93mabnormalities[0m [93mhas[0m [93mpoor[0m [93mprognosis[0m, [93mdespite[0m the [93muse[0m of [93mnovel[0m [93mtherapeutic[0m [93magents[0m. [93mHowever[0m, the [93mindividual[0m [93mcontribution[0m of [93mspecific[0m [93mHR[0m [93mgenetic[0m [93mabnormalities[0m or [93mtheir[0m [93mco[0m-[93moccurrence[0m to [93mpoor[0m [93moutcomes[0m, [93mespecially[0m in the [93mera[0m of [93mnovel[0m [93magents[0m, [93mremains[0m [93munclear[0m. This [93mstudy[0m [93mevaluated[0m the [93mimpact[0m of [93mmulti[0m-[93mhit[0m [93mTP53[0m ([93mdel[0m([93m17p[0m) and [93mTP53[0m [91mmutation[0m or ≥ [93m2[0m [93mTP53[0m [91mmutations[0m) [93mcompared[0m with [93mother[0m [93mHR[0m [93mabnormalities[0m on [93mprogression[0m-[93mfree[0m [93msurvival[0m ([93mPFS[0m), [93moverall[0m [93msurvival[0m ([93mOS[0m) and [93mblood[0m [93msignature[0m in a [93mreal[0m-[93mworld[0m [93mcohort[0m of [93m204[0m [93mpatients[0m with [93mMM[0m [93mtreated[0m with [93mnovel[0m [93magents[0m ([93mmedian[0m [93mfollow[0m-up [93m28[0m [93mmonths[0m). [93mPatients[0m with [93mmulti[0m-[93mhit[0m [93mTP53[0m ([93m10[0m.[93m4[0m%) [93mhad[0m the [93mshortest[0m [93mPFS[0m and [93mOS[0m [93mcompared[0m with those with [93msingle[0m [93mHR[0m [93mabnormalities[0m ([93mp[0m ≤ [93m0[0m.[93m011[0m) or with [93mco[0m-[93moccurrence[0m of ≥ [93m2[0m [93mother[0m [93mHR[0m [93mabnormalities[0m ([93mp[0m ≤ [93m0[0m.[93m002[0m), [93mregardless[0m of [93mtherapy[0m [93mline[0m. The [93mrelative[0m [93mrisk[0m of [93mearly[0m [93mprogression[0m in [93mpatients[0m with [93mmulti[0m-[93mhit[0m [93mTP53[0m was [93malmost[0m [93mthree[0m [93mtimes[0m [93mhigher[0m than that of [93mpatients[0m with [93mother[0m [93mHR[0m [93mabnormalities[0m. In [93mconclusion[0m, [93mmulti[0m-[93mhit[0m [93mTP53[0m is [93massociated[0m with the [93mpoorest[0m [93msurvival[0m among [93mall[0m [93mHR[0m [93msubgroups[0m in [93mMM[0m. [93mConsidering[0m that [93mTP53[0m [93malterations[0m [93maccumulate[0m during [93mMM[0m [93mprogression[0m and are [93massociated[0m with [93mdrug[0m [93mresistance[0m even in the [93mcontext[0m of [93mnovel[0m [93mtherapies[0m, [93mour[0m [93mstudy[0m [93mfurther[0m [93memphasizes[0m the [93mneed[0m for [93mroutine[0m [93mevaluation[0m of [93mboth[0m [93mdel[0m([93m17p[0m) and [93mTP53[0m [91mmutations[0m. [93mPatients[0m with [93mmulti[0m-[93mhit[0m [93mTP53[0m [93mshould[0m be [93mprioritized[0m for [93minclusion[0m in [93mtrials[0m of [93mnovel[0m [93mtherapeutic[0m [93mstrategies[0m.

- [93mLong[0m-[93mTerm[0m [93mClinical[0m [93mOutcomes[0m for [93mSingle[0m [93mDental[0m [93mCrowns[0m [93mversus[0m [93mExtensive[0m [93mDirect[0m [93mRestorations[0m: A [93mRegister[0m-[93mBased[0m [93mCohort[0m [93mStudy[0m with up to [93m10[0m [93mYears[0m of [93mFollow[0m-Up in a [93mSwedish[0m [93mPopulation[0m.: [93mObjective[0m: [93mThere[0m is a [93mlack[0m of [93mconsensus[0m [93mregarding[0m the [93moptimal[0m [93mmethod[0m for [93mrestoring[0m [93mteeth[0m with [93mextensive[0m [93mdefects[0m. In [93mparticular[0m, it'[93ms[0m not [93mclear[0m [93mwhether[0m a [93mdirect[0m [93mrestoration[0m ([93mtooth[0m [93mfilling[0m) [93mcan[0m [93machieve[0m [93mcomparable[0m [93mtooth[0m [93msurvival[0m [93mrates[0m to a [93mdental[0m [93mcrown[0m ([93mindirect[0m [93mrestoration[0m). This [93mstudy[0m [93mcompares[0m the [93msurvival[0m [93mrates[0m with up to [93m10[0m [93myears[0m [93mpost[0m-[93mintervention[0m for [93mlarge[0m [93mdirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m ([93mfillings[0m [93minvolving[0m [93mthree[0m or [93mmore[0m [93msurfaces[0m) with those of [93mindirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m ([93msingle[0m [93mcrowns[0m), [93musing[0m a [93mlarge[0m [93mdataset[0m. [93mMethods[0m: [93mAll[0m [93mpatients[0m ([93mN[0m = [93m189[0m,[93m195[0m) who [93mreceived[0m [93meither[0m [93msingle[0m [93mcrowns[0m ([93mindirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m) or [93mdirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m ([93minvolving[0m [93mthree[0m or [93mmore[0m [93msurfaces[0m) between [93m2014[0m and [93m2019[0m in the [93mpublic[0m [93mdental[0m [93mclinics[0m of a [93mSwedish[0m [93mregion[0m were [93mfollowed[0m [93mretrospectively[0m for a [93mperiod[0m of [93m5[0m to [93m10[0m [93myears[0m ([93mN[0m: [93m343[0m,[93m809[0m [93mteeth[0m). [93mOutcome[0m [93mmeasures[0m [93mincluded[0m [93mtooth[0m [93mextraction[0m, [93mroot[0m [93mcanal[0m [93mtreatment[0m, and [93mretreatment[0m with [93meither[0m [93mdirect[0m or [93mindirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m. [93mResults[0m: The [93m10[0m-[93myear[0m [93mcumulative[0m [93msurvival[0m [93mrates[0m were [93m92[0m,[93m77[0m% for [93mindirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m and [93m89[0m,[93m09[0m% for [93mdirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m. [93mDirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m were [93massociated[0m with a [93msignificantly[0m [93mgreater[0m [93mneed[0m for [93mretreatment[0m during the [93m10[0m-[93myear[0m [93mperiod[0m [93mcompared[0m to [93mindirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m. The [93mincidence[0m [93mrate[0m [93mratio[0m ([93mIRR[0m) for [93mdirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m was [93m1[0m.[93m59[0m ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m [93m1[0m.[93m578[0m-[93m1[0m.[93m611[0m) [93mrelative[0m to [93mindirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m. [93mPrevious[0m [93mroot[0m [93mcanal[0m [93mtreatment[0m or the [93mpresence[0m of a [93mpost[0m and [93mcore[0m [93msignificantly[0m [93mincreased[0m the [93mrisk[0m of [93mextraction[0m, with [93mhazard[0m [93mratios[0m of [93m2[0m.[93m90[0m ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m [93m2[0m.[93m8389[0m-[93m2[0m.[93m9824[0m) and [93m1[0m.[93m40[0m ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m [93m1[0m.[93m3269[0m-[93m1[0m.[93m4928[0m), [93mrespectively[0m. [93mConclusion[0m: [93mTeeth[0m [93mrestored[0m with [93mlarge[0m [93mdirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m [93mtended[0m to [93mrequire[0m [93mmore[0m [93mfrequent[0m [93mretreatments[0m and [93mshowed[0m a [93mhigher[0m [93mrisk[0m of [93mextraction[0m over a [93mperiod[0m of up to [93m10[0m [93myears[0m [93mcompared[0m with [93mteeth[0m [93mrestored[0m with [93mindirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m. This [93mtrend[0m was [93mparticularly[0m [93mevident[0m among [93mnon[0m-[93mvital[0m [93mteeth[0m, [93mespecially[0m those with a [93mpost[0m and [93mcore[0m or [93mprevious[0m [93mroot[0m [93mcanal[0m [93mtreatment[0m. [93mHowever[0m, [93mdue[0m to the [93mretrospective[0m [92mdesign[0m and [93mpotential[0m [93minclusion[0m [93mbias[0m, these [93mfindings[0m [93mshould[0m be [93minterpreted[0m with [93mcaution[0m. [93mClinical[0m [93msignificance[0m: Within the [93mlimitations[0m of this [93mretrospective[0m, [93mnon[0m-[93mrandomized[0m [93mstudy[0m, [93mteeth[0m [93mrestored[0m with [93mlarge[0m [93mdirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m [93mappeared[0m to [93mhave[0m [93mslightly[0m [93mlower[0m [93mlong[0m-[93mterm[0m [93msurvival[0m and a [93msomewhat[0m [93mhigher[0m [93mneed[0m for [93mretreatment[0m than [93mteeth[0m [93mrestored[0m with [93mcrowns[0m.
